The Batch class represents a batch of products with specific attributes.

The EditRoleButtonListener class handles the action when the "Edit Role" button is clicked.

The GradientPanel class represents a JPanel with a gradient background.

The IDAO interface provides a static method for obtaining a database connection.

The LoginPageComponent class is a component listener controller for managing component resizing in the LoginPage view.

The LogoutButtonListener class implements ActionListener for handling logout button events.
Main
 
PriceListener
The PriceListener class implements the DocumentListener interface to validate and handle input in a text field for price values.
Product
The Product class represents a product entity with various attributes.
ProductCategory
The ProductCategory class serves as an entity controller for managing product categories.
ProductCategoryDAO
The ProductCategoryDAO class provides data access methods for interacting with the product_categories table.
ProductDAO
The ProductDAO class provides data access methods for interacting with the products table.
ProductDataFetchers
The ProductDataFetchers class provides methods to fetch product-related information and searched products from the respective controllers (Product, ProductCategory, Supplier).
ProductTableModel
The ProductTableModel class extends DefaultTableModel and represents the table model for displaying product information.
ProductTableSelection
The ProductTableSelection class implements ListSelectionListener and handles events when a row is selected in the product table.
QuantityAlertModel
The QuantityAlertModel class extends DefaultTableModel and represents the table model for displaying products in the quantity alert scenario.
QuantityListener
The QuantityListener class implements the DocumentListener interface to validate and handle input in a text field for quantity values.

The Sale class represents a sale entity with various attributes.
SaleDAO
The SaleDAO class provides data access methods for interacting with the sales table.

SaleItemDAO
The SaleItemDAO class provides data access methods for interacting with the sale_items table.

The SalesButtonListener class represents an ActionListener for the "Sales" button in the AdminPortal.
